channel.title: Heeeeeeeeeeeeeelp fffsss!
channel.description:
Ok well,
Its a 525, and when ever someone logs in it saves all games. But if the server closed for the auto restarter it roll's back.
How can I edit it to auto save everyone like every 30 seconds?

item.title: Heeeeeeeeeeeeeelp fffsss!
item.dc:creator: @icereign2 icereign2
item.description:
@icereign2 wrote:

it doesnt save all players try making a ::bootall command or just do ::update ## so it saves everyones account and rollbacks dont happen

Read full topic
